step2_button_download_excel: 📥 Download Excel with intents and duplicates
step2_success_curation_confirmed: ✅ Curated intents ready to generate YAML.
step3_info_yaml_loaded: ℹ️ An original YAML file is already loaded (probably from Step 1). If you upload a new one here, it will replace it.
step3_warning_no_yaml: ⚠️ No original YAML has been loaded. Upload it here to merge curated intents with its structure and preserve original IDs.
step3_uploader_yaml_label: Upload the original base YAML file (optional if already loaded and you don't want to replace it)
step3_success_yaml_loaded: ✅ Original base YAML loaded/updated in session.
step3_subheader_load_excel: Upload Curated Excel and Generate YAML
step3_markdown_upload_excel: 📤 You can upload the curated Excel file to generate the final YAML.
step3_button_generate_yaml: Generate Complete YAML Ready for Archy
step3_error_no_intents_data: ❌ No intent data to generate YAML. Upload an Excel or complete Step 2.
step3_error_no_original_yaml: ❌ Original YAML file not found. Please upload it in this step or go back to Step 1.
step4_error_missing_data: ❌ Missing data. Make sure to upload the YAML file and complete all fields.
step4_error_publish: ❌ Error publishing the flow. See details below.
